allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Retell & WhatsApp integration with appointment sync

- Fix Retell webhook to extract appointments from transcript_with_tool_calls
- Add timezone conversion \(America/Detroit â†’ UTC\) for correct scheduling
- Prevent duplicate appointments between call_ended and call_analyzed events
- Fix NaN error in dashboard metrics \(whatsapp_leads fallback\)
- Update lead_metrics view to include whatsapp_leads column
- Add createAppointmentFromWebhook service for unified appointment creation
- WhatsApp webhook now supports appointment object from n8n

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Retell & WhatsApp integration with appointment sync

- Fix Retell webhook to extract appointments from transcript_with_tool_calls
- Add timezone conversion \(America/Detroit -> UTC\) for correct scheduling
- Prevent duplicate appointments between call_ended and call_analyzed events
- Fix NaN error in dashboard metrics \(whatsapp_leads fallback\)
- Update lead_metrics view to include whatsapp_leads column
- Add createAppointmentFromWebhook service for unified appointment creation
- WhatsApp webhook now supports appointment object from n8n

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
